description:
Binary Holds are now making their hold packs out of recycled plastic, so future generations can enjoy getting a grip on our planet too. These tiny screw-ons go just about anywhere. Use them as heinous crimps, intermediates, foot holds, or jibs on volumes.

  • Made from recycled ABS
  • Comes with mounting hardware
name: Binary Holds Vector Bits Recycled 15 Crimp Hold Pack
